data.text: @tannahillglen @biello_joseph I was struck (yet again?) while scrolling through the time machine of my phone, just how shocking the sudden closure of society, PPE everywhere, & then *schools not reopening* & WFH continuing was for every single one of us. The unspoken msgs were louder than the spoken ones IMO.

@tannahillglen @KIDSFIR91979351 Authorities, yes.  
Anyone in the know, no.
@biello_joseph @KIDSFIR91979351 I’d take step further and say it was clearly communicated by authorities that illness/death/spread/endemicity would all be managed with NPIs
@KIDSFIR91979351 Thanks! This is proof we knew the data on risk to kids from the beginning.

@KIDSFIR91979351 Neither was I! It was all a shock. I Googled and found this article which I am guessing came from the same modeling? Over half all Californians getting Alpha in 2 months (!) -- pre-vaccines. Might be why Californians are especially scared of COVID still: https://t.co/CHBZWDT7zE
@MmeBlackBalloon Yikes.  I don’t know.  I wasn’t actually *on* Twitter then! 😂😂

@KIDSFIR91979351 Who was it who said 2 million Californians would die? It was on the radio and cited modeling, probably a week into our shelter in place? I still cannot believe that, but I actually have it in an official email I was sent by my University, explaining our switch to remote suddenly.

@biello_joseph SO. Many. messaging. Mistakes.

People gonna people?  And that hard-wired fear response is crazy powerful.
